test.explanation:
Avoid animation or blinking CSS as it can impact the accessibility of your page.

This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  2.2.2(A) : Pause, Stop, Hide:  
    For moving, blinking, scrolling, or auto-updating information, all of the following are true:
    
    Moving, blinking, scrolling  
    For any moving, blinking or scrolling information that (1) starts automatically, (2) lasts more than five seconds, and (3) is presented in parallel with other content, there is a mechanism for the user to pause, stop, or hide it unless the movement, blinking, or scrolling is part of an activity where it is essential; and
    
    Auto-updating  
    For any auto-updating information that (1) starts automatically and (2) is presented in parallel with other content, there is a mechanism for the user to pause, stop, or hide it or to control the frequency of the update unless the auto-updating is part of an activity where it is essential.
    
2.  2.3.1(A) : Three Flashes or Below Threshold:  
    Web pages do not contain anything that flashes more than three times in any one second period, or the flash is below the general flash and red flash thr~
test.fix: Remove the offending CSS

        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => name) issue_title,
       aapi.column_id component_id,
       aapi.parent_column_id parent_component_id,
       aapi.heading,
       aapi.label,
       aapi.item_type,
       aapi.name,
			 aapi.workspace
from aapi
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapi.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapi.application_id
where aapi.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation:
This plausibly affects sighted users as much as screen-reader users. Column headings should be unique for clarity.

This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  2.5.3(A) : Label in Name: For user interface components with labels that include text or images of text, the name contains the text that is presented visually.
2.  3.3.2(A) : Labels or Instructions:  
    Labels or instructions are provided when content requires user input.
3.  4.1.2(A) : Name, Role, Value : For all user interface components (including but not limited to: form elements, links and components generated by scripts), the name and role can be programmatically determined; states, properties, and values that can be set by the user can be programmatically set; and notification of changes to these items is available to user agents, including assistive technologies.
4.  2.4.6(AA) : Headings and labels describe topic or purpose.
test.fix: Make the headings unique.

test.test_name: Page Templates should avoid CSS animations
test.query_clob:
with aatp as (select case
                      when (lower(trim(inline_css)) like '%blink%'
                            or lower(trim(inline_css)) like '%animation%') then 'N' 
                      else 'Y'
                      end pass_yn,
                      inline_css, 
                      application_id,
                      template_name,
                      last_updated_by,

       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aatp.last_updated_by,
       aatp.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page Templates `%0` (app %1) is using a CSS animation: `%2`', 
        p0 => aatp.template_name, 
        p1 => aatp.application_id,
        p2 => aatp.inline_css) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page Templates `%0` (app %1) has a CSS animation', 
        p0 => aatp.template_name, 
        p1 => aatp.application_id) issue_title,
       aatp.page_template_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aatp.template_name,
       aatp.inline_css
from aatp
where aatp.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
test.explanation:
Avoid animation CSS as it can impact the accessibility of your page.

This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  2.2.2(A) : Pause, Stop, Hide:  
    For moving, blinking, scrolling, or auto-updating information, all of the following are true:
    
    Moving, blinking, scrolling  
    For any moving, blinking or scrolling information that (1) starts automatically, (2) lasts more than five seconds, and (3) is presented in parallel with other content, there is a mechanism for the user to pause, stop, or hide it unless the movement, blinking, or scrolling is part of an activity where it is essential; and
    
    Auto-updating  
    For any auto-updating information that (1) starts automatically and (2) is presented in parallel with other content, there is a mechanism for the user to pause, stop, or hide it or to control the frequency of the update unless the auto-updating is part of an activity where it is essential.
    
2.  2.3.1(A) : Three Flashes or Below Threshold:  
    Web pages do not contain anything that flashes more than three times in any one second period, or the flash is below the general flash and red flash thr~
test.fix: Remove the offending CSS

test.test_name: IG Columns may need autocomplete
test.query_clob:
with aapic as (
    select case
             when (lower(trim(b.item_attributes)) not like '%autocomplete%'
                   or trim(b.item_attributes) is null) 
             then 'N' 
             else 'Y'
             end pass_yn,
           b.application_id,
           b.page_id, 
           b.region_id,
           b.region_name, 
           b.source_expression,
           b.item_attributes,
           b.workspace,
           b.build_option,
           b.last_updated_by,
           b.last_updated_on,
           b.name,
           b.item_type,
           b.label,
           b.heading,
           b.parent_column_id,
           b.column_id
    from apex_appl_page_igs a,
         apex_appl_page_ig_columns b
    where a.application_id = b.application_id
      and b.region_id = a.region_id
      and a.is_editable = 'Yes'
      and b.is_query_only = 'No'
      and lower(b.heading) not like '%api%'
      and (
            (lower(b.heading) like '%name%' and (lower(b.heading) like '%first%' or lower(b.heading) like '%last%' or lower(b.heading) like '%family%'))
            or 
            (lower(b.heading) like '%address%')
            or 
            (lower(b.heading) like '%phone number%')
            or 
            (lower(b.heading) like '%mail%')
            or 
            (lower(b.heading) like '%birthday%' or lower(b.heading) like '%bday%')
         )
  )
select aapic.pass_yn,
       aapic.workspace,
       aapic.application_id, 
       aapic.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapic.last_updated_by,
       aapic.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) may benefit from autocomplete', 
        p0 => aapic.heading, 
        p1 => aapic.application_id,
        p2 => aapic.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) may benefit from autocomplete', 
        p0 => aapic.heading, 
        p1 => aapic.application_id,
        p2 => aapic.page_id) issue_title,
       aapic.column_id component_id,
       aapic.parent_column_id parent_component_id,
       aapic.heading,
       aapic.label,
       aapic.item_type,
       aapic.name
from aapic
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapic.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapic.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapic.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapic.application_id
where aapic.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation:
If you are soliciting routine information like name, address, contact info, etc - you can prompt the browser to supply the stored information for the user. This can be big help to all users and users with accessibility-needs especially.

This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  1.3.5(AA) : Identify Input Purpose:
    
    The purpose of each input field collecting information about the user can be programmatically determined when:
    
    The input field serves a purpose identified in the Input Purposes for User Interface Components section; and  
    The content is implemented using technologies with support for identifying the expected meaning for form input data.
test.fix: Add the appropriate [autocomplete attribute](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/autocomplete). For example, add `autocomplete="email"`  to the `Custom Attributes` field

test.test_name: Inline with field error notification is insufficient
test.query_clob:
with aapv as (
        select case  when error_display_location = 'INLINE_WITH_FIELD' 
                     then 'N' 
                     else 'Y'
                     end pass_yn,
                application_id,
                page_id, 
                validation_name,
                workspace,
                last_updated_by,
                last_updated_on,
                build_option,
                validation_id,
                error_display_location
           from apex_application_page_val
    )
select aapv.pass_yn,
       aapv.workspace,
       aapv.application_id, 
       aapv.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapv.last_updated_by,
       aapv.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page Validation `%0` (app %1, page %2) error display settings are misconfigured: `%3`', 
        p0 => aapv.validation_name, 
        p1 => aapv.application_id,
        p2 => aapv.page_id,
        p3 => aapv.error_display_location) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page Validation `%0` (app %1, page %2) error display settings are misconfigured', 
        p0 => aapv.validation_name, 
        p1 => aapv.application_id,
        p2 => aapv.page_id) issue_title,
       aapv.validation_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapv.validation_name,
       aapv.error_display_location
from aapv
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapv.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapv.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapv.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapv.application_id
where aapv.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation:
Validation error messages should be displayed with the setting `Inline with Field and in Notification` - the other settings are insufficiently accessible.

This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  1.3.3(A) : Sensory Characteristics : Instructions provided for understanding and operating content do not rely solely on sensory characteristics of components such as shape, color, size, visual location, orientation, or sound.
2.  1.4.1(A) : Use of Color : Color is not used as the only visual means of conveying information, indicating an action, prompting a response, or distinguishing a visual element.
3.  3.3.1(A) : Error Identification: If an input error is automatically detected, the item that is in error is identified and the error is described to the user in text.
4.  3.3.3(AA) : Error Suggestion : If an input error is automatically detected and suggestions for correction are known, then the suggestions are provided to the user, unless it would jeopardize the security or purpose of the content.
test.fix: Switch the display location to be `Inline with Field and in Notification`

1.  2.2.2(A) : Pause, Stop, Hide:

    Auto-updating  
    For any auto-updating information that (1) starts automatically and (2) is presented in parallel with other content, there is a mechanism for the user to pause, stop, or hide it or to control the frequency of the update unless the auto-updating is part of an activity where it is essential.
    
2.  2.3.1(A) : Three Flashes or Below Threshold:  
    Web pages do not contain anything that flashes more than three times in any one second period, or the flash is below the general flash and red flash thr~

test.test_name: Application Tabs should avoid tabindex
test.query_clob:
with aat as (select case
                     when (lower(trim(tab_image_attributes)) like '%tabindex%' ) 
                     then 'N' 
                     else 'Y'
                     end pass_yn,
                     application_id,
                     tab_image_attributes,
                     last_updated_by,
                     last_updated_on,
                     workspace,
                     build_option,
                     tab_name,
                     tab_id
             from apex_application_tabs)
select aat.pass_yn,
       aat.workspace,
       aat.application_id, 
       null page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aat.last_updated_by,
       aat.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Tab `%0` (app %1) has a tabindex set :`%2`', 
        p0 => aat.tab_name, 
        p1 => aat.application_id,
        p2 => aat.tab_image_attributes) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Tab `%0` (app %1) has a tabindex set', 
        p0 => aat.tab_name, 
        p1 => aat.application_id) issue_title,
       aat.tab_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aat.tab_name,
       aat.tab_image_attributes
from aat
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aat.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aat.application_id
where aat.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation:
It is inadvisable to alter the default tabindex of elements on a page because it can cause the experience between the sighted and unsighted users to diverge.

This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  2.4.3(A) : Focus Order : If a Web page can be navigated sequentially and the navigation sequences affect meaning or operation, focusable components receive focus in an order that preserves meaning and operability.
test.fix: Remove the hard-coded tabindex.

test.test_name: Reports should have Row Headers
test.query_clob:
with rpt_cols as (
       select pic.application_id, 
              pic.page_id, 
              pic.region_name, 
              pic.use_as_row_header,
              pic.region_id, 
              'IR' report_type,
              pic.created_by,
              pic.created_on,
              pic.updated_by,
              pic.updated_on,
              pic.column_id,
              pic.workspace,
              pic.build_option
       from v_svt_apex_application_page_ir_col pic
       union all
       select pig.application_id, 
              pig.page_id, 
              pig.region_name, 
              pig.use_as_row_header,
              pig.region_id, 
              'IG' report_type,
              null created_by,
              null created_on,
              pig.last_updated_by,
              pig.last_updated_on,
              pig.column_id,
              pig.workspace,
              pig.build_option
       from apex_appl_page_ig_columns pig 
       union all
       select prc.application_id, 
              prc.page_id, 
              prc.region_name, 
              prc.use_as_row_header,
              prc.region_id, 
              'C' report_type,
              null created_by,
              null created_on,
              prc.last_updated_by,
              prc.last_updated_on,
              prc.region_report_column_id,
              prc.workspace,
              prc.build_option
       from apex_application_page_rpt_cols prc 
       where column_is_hidden = 'No'
),
rpt_cols_fm as (
       select rc.application_id, 
              rc.page_id, 
              rc.region_name, 
              rc.use_as_row_header,
              rc.region_id, 
              rc.report_type,
              apex_string.format(
              p_message => q'^`%0` is missing a row header (App : %1, Page : %2, Region id : %3). Regions that support row headers should have a column with the "Use as Row Header" attribute set to Yes for accessibility reasons.^',
              p0 => rc.region_name,
              p1 => rc.application_id,
              p2 => rc.page_id,
              p3 => rc.region_id
              ) validation_failure_message,
              apex_string.format(
              p_message => '`%0` is missing a row header (app %1, page %2, region id %3)',
              p0 => rc.region_name,
              p1 => rc.application_id,
              p2 => rc.page_id,
              p3 => rc.region_id
              ) issue_title,
              app.created_by,
              app.created_on,
              coalesce(pr.last_updated_by, app.last_updated_by) last_updated_by, 
              coalesce(pr.last_updated_on, app.last_updated_on) last_updated_on,
              rc.column_id,
              rc.workspace
       from rpt_cols rc 
       inner join apex_application_page_regions pr on  pr.region_id = rc.region_id
                                                   and pr.page_id = rc.page_id 
                                                   and pr.application_id = rc.application_id
                                                   and coalesce(pr.condition_type_code,'NA') != 'NEVER'
       inner join apex_application_pages app on  app.page_id        = rc.page_id
                                             and app.application_id = rc.application_id
       inner join  apex_applications aa on  rc.application_id     = aa.application_id
                                          and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
       left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = app.build_option
                                                            and aabo1.application_id = app.application_id
       left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = rc.build_option
                                                            and aabo2.application_id = rc.application_id
       where coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
       and   coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
)
select case when count(case when rcf.use_as_row_header = 'Yes'
                            then 'x'
                            when rcf.use_as_row_header = 'Y'
                            then 'x'
                            end) > 0
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end  pass_yn,
       rcf.application_id, 
       rcf.page_id, 
       rcf.region_name, 
       rcf.region_id,
       rcf.report_type,
       rcf.created_by,
       rcf.created_on,
       rcf.last_updated_by, 
       rcf.last_updated_on,
       rcf.validation_failure_message,
       rcf.issue_title,
       apr.report_template,
       rcf.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       rcf.workspace
from rpt_cols_fm rcf
inner join apex_application_page_regions apr on rcf.region_id = apr.region_id
                                             and coalesce(apr.report_template ,'NA') not in ('List Item')
                                             and apr.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
group by rcf.application_id, 
         rcf.page_id, 
         rcf.region_name, 
         rcf.region_id,
         rcf.report_type,
         rcf.created_by,
         rcf.created_on,
         rcf.last_updated_by, 
         rcf.last_updated_on,
         rcf.validation_failure_message,
         rcf.issue_title,
         apr.report_template,
         rcf.workspace
test.explanation:
One or more columns must have "Value Identifies Row" switched on so that screen readers can better describe individual records of a table.

This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  1.1.1(A) : Non-text Content:  
    All non-text content that is presented to the user has a text alternative that serves the equivalent purpose, except for the situations listed below.
2.  1.3.1(A) : Info and Relationships : Information, structure, and relationships conveyed through presentation can be programmatically determined or are available in text.
3.  1.3.2(A) : Meaningful Sequence : When the sequence in which content is presented affects its meaning, a correct reading sequence can be programmatically determined.
test.fix: At the column level of your report, toggle on "Value Identifies Row" for many columns is appropriate to uniquely describe the record in human-friendly terms.

test.explanation:
It is inadvisable to alter the default tabindex of elements on a page because it can cause the experience between the sighted and unsighted users to diverge.

This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  2.4.3(A) : Focus Order : If a Web page can be navigated sequentially and the navigation sequences affect meaning or operation, focusable components receive focus in an order that preserves meaning and operability.
test.fix: Remove the hard-coded tabindex.

test.test_name: Regions on a page must be unique
test.query_clob:
with aapr as (select application_id,
                      page_id,
                      region_name,
                      parent_region_name,
                      display_sequence, 
                      build_option, 
                      source_type, 
                      display_position, 
                      template, 
                      region_id, 
                      last_updated_on, 
                      last_updated_by,
							        workspace,
                      row_number( ) over (partition by workspace,application_id,page_id,trim(lower(region_name)) order by display_sequence nulls last) value_dup_cnt
                  from apex_application_page_regions
             )
select case when aapr.value_dup_cnt > 1 
            then 'N' 
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('There is more than one region `%0` on page %2 (app %1,  display sequence %3, parent region `%4`, region id %5). Region names must be unique for accessibility.', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.display_sequence,
        p4 => aapr.parent_region_name,
        p5 => aapr.region_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` on page %2 is not unique (app %1, region id %5)', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p5 => aapr.region_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.display_sequence,
       aapr.parent_region_name,
			 aapr.workspace
from aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation:
Screen-readers announce buttons and page items in the context of their parent region. Consequently, it helps for region names to be unique per page.

This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  2.5.3(A) : Label in Name: For user interface components with labels that include text or images of text, the name contains the text that is presented visually.
2.  3.3.2(A) : Labels or Instructions:  
    Labels or instructions are provided when content requires user input.
3.  4.1.2(A) : Name, Role, Value : For all user interface components (including but not limited to: form elements, links and components generated by scripts), the name and role can be programmatically determined; states, properties, and values that can be set by the user can be programmatically set; and notification of changes to these items is available to user agents, including assistive technologies.
4.  2.4.6(AA) : Headings and labels describe topic or purpose.
test.fix: Make the region names more descriptive

test.test_name: Pages should avoid hardcoding tab indexes
test.query_clob:
with aap as (
    select case
         when lower(trim(dialog_attributes)) like '%tabindex%' 
         then 'N' 
         else 'Y'
         end pass_yn,
       page_id,
       page_name,
       application_id,
       dialog_attributes,
       created_by,
       created_on,
       last_updated_by,
       last_updated_on,
       build_option,
       page_mode,
	     workspace
    from apex_application_pages)
select aap.pass_yn,                          
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) has a hardcoded tab index: `%3`', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id,
				p3 => aap.dialog_attributes) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) has a hardcoded tab index', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) issue_title,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aap.page_name,
       aap.page_mode,
			 aap.dialog_attributes,
			 aap.workspace
from aap
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aap.application_id
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation:
It is inadvisable to alter the default tabindex of elements on a page because it can cause the experience between the sighted and unsighted users to diverge.

This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  2.4.3(A) : Focus Order : If a Web page can be navigated sequentially and the navigation sequences affect meaning or operation, focusable components receive focus in an order that preserves meaning and operability.
test.fix: Remove the hard-coded tabindex.

test.test_name: Page items with html images have alt text
test.query_clob:
with std as (select case
                    when display_as = 'Display Image'
                    then case when attribute_01 = 'DB_COLUMN' 
                              and trim(attribute_03) is null
                              then 'N'
                              when attribute_01 = 'SQL' 
                              and ((coalesce((length(lower(html_form_element_attributes)) - length(replace(lower(html_form_element_attributes),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(html_form_element_attributes)), 0) > 
                                  coalesce((length(lower(html_form_element_attributes)) - length(replace(lower(html_form_element_attributes),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(html_form_element_attributes)), 0)) 
                                  or lower(replace(html_form_element_attributes,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' 
                                  or lower(html_form_element_attributes) like '% alt %' 
                                  or trim(html_form_element_attributes) is null)
                              then 'N'
                              when attribute_01 = 'URL' 
                              and trim(attribute_02) is null
                              then 'N'
                              else 'Y'
                              end 
                    when lower(item_source) like '%<img%'
                    then case when (coalesce((length(lower(item_source)) - length(replace(lower(item_source),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(item_source)), 0) > 
                                  coalesce((length(lower(item_source)) - length(replace(lower(item_source),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(item_source)), 0))
                              or lower(replace(item_source,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' 
                              or lower(item_source) like '% alt %'
                              then 'N'
                              else 'Y'
                              end
                    when lower(pre_element_text) like '%<img%'
                    then case when (coalesce((length(lower(pre_element_text)) - length(replace(lower(pre_element_text),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(pre_element_text)), 0) > 
                                  coalesce((length(lower(pre_element_text)) - length(replace(lower(pre_element_text),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(pre_element_text)), 0)) 
                              or lower(replace(pre_element_text,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' 
                              or lower(pre_element_text) like '% alt %'
                              then 'N'
                              else 'Y'
                              end
                    when lower(post_element_text) like '%<img%'
                    then case when (coalesce((length(lower(post_element_text)) - length(replace(lower(post_element_text),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(post_element_text)), 0) > 
                                  coalesce((length(lower(post_element_text)) - length(replace(lower(post_element_text),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(post_element_text)), 0)) 
                              or lower(replace(post_element_text,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' 
                              or lower(post_element_text) like '% alt %'
                              then 'N'
                              else 'Y'
                              end
                    else 'Y'
                    end pass_yn, 
                    html_form_element_attributes src,
                    application_id,
                    page_id,
                    item_id,
                    workspace,
                    attribute_01,
                    html_form_element_attributes,
                    attribute_03,
                    attribute_02,
                    item_source,
                    pre_element_text,
                    post_element_text,
                    display_as,
                    html_table_cell_attr_element
                from apex_application_page_items)
select std.pass_yn,                          
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapi.last_updated_by,
       aapi.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('%4 Page Item `%0` (app %1, page %2) has an image with missing alt text (`%3`) [Based on : `%5`, alt text : `%6`]', 
        p0 => aapi.item_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => std.src,
        p4 => std.display_as,
        p5 => std.attribute_01,
        p6 => std.attribute_02
        ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page Item `%0` (app %1, page %2) has an image with missing alt text', 
        p0 => aapi.item_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id) issue_title,
       aapi.item_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapi.item_name,
       std.src,
       std.workspace,
       std.attribute_01 based_on,
       std.html_form_element_attributes custom_attributes,
       std.attribute_03,
       std.attribute_02 alternative_text,
       std.item_source,
       std.pre_element_text,
       std.post_element_text,
       std.display_as,
       std.html_table_cell_attr_element column_attributes
from std
inner join apex_application_page_items aapi on std.application_id = aapi.application_id
                                            and std.page_id = aapi.page_id 
                                            and std.item_id = aapi.item_id
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapi.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapi.application_id
where std.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'

This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

test.test_name: IR columns need unique labels
test.query_clob:
with aapi as (
        select ROW_NUMBER( ) OVER (PARTITION BY application_id,page_id,region_id,trim(lower(form_label)) ORDER BY display_order NULLS LAST) value_dup_cnt,
                   application_id,
                   page_id,
                   region_id,
                   region_name,
                   report_label,
                   column_alias,
                   display_order,
                   created_by,
                   created_on,
                   updated_by,
                   updated_on,
                   build_option,
                   display_text_as,
                   column_id,
                   form_label,
	                 workspace
              from apex_application_page_ir_col
    )
select case when aapi.value_dup_cnt > 1 
            then 'N' 
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       aapi.created_by,
       aapi.created_on,
       aapi.updated_by last_updated_by,
       aapi.updated_on last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Report Column `%4` (app %1, page %2, region `%3`, `%0`) is not unique . Column labels should be unique to the page for accessibility.', 
        p0 => aapi.column_alias, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => aapi.region_name,
        p4 => aapi.form_label) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Report Column `%4` (app %1, page %2, region `%3`, `%0`) is not unique', 
        p0 => aapi.column_alias, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => aapi.region_name,
        p4 => aapi.form_label) issue_title,
       aapi.column_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapi.column_alias,
       aapi.report_label,
       aapi.display_text_as,
			 aapi.workspace
from aapi
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapi.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapi.application_id

and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'

test.test_name: Regions with HTML images should have alt text
test.query_clob:
with std as (select case
                     when (coalesce((length(lower(region_source)) - length(replace(lower(region_source),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(region_source)), 0) > 
                                coalesce((length(lower(region_source)) - length(replace(lower(region_source),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(region_source)), 0)) or
                                lower(replace(region_source,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' or
                                lower(region_source) like '% alt %'
                     then 'N'  
                     else 'Y'
                     end pass_yn,
                     to_char(substr(region_source,1,4000)) src,
                     application_id,page_id,region_id, workspace
            from apex_application_page_regions
            where lower(region_source) like '%<img%'
            union
            select case
                   when (coalesce((length(lower(region_header_text)) - length(replace(lower(region_header_text),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(region_header_text)), 0) > 
                                coalesce((length(lower(region_header_text)) - length(replace(lower(region_header_text),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(region_header_text)), 0)) or
                                lower(replace(region_header_text,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' or
                                lower(region_header_text) like '% alt %'
                   then 'N'
                   else 'Y'
                   end pass_yn,
                   region_header_text,
                   application_id,page_id,region_id, workspace
            from apex_application_page_regions
            where lower(REGION_HEADER_TEXT) like '%<img%'
            union
            select case
                   when (coalesce((length(lower(region_footer_text)) - length(replace(lower(region_footer_text),'<img',null)))/4, length(lower(region_footer_text)), 0) > 
                               coalesce((length(lower(region_footer_text)) - length(replace(lower(region_footer_text),'alt="',null)))/5, length(lower(region_footer_text)), 0)) or
                               lower(replace(region_footer_text,' ','')) like '%alt=""%' or
                               lower(region_footer_text) like '% alt %'
                   then 'N'
                   else 'Y'
                   end pass_yn,
                   region_footer_text,
                   application_id,page_id,region_id, workspace
            from apex_application_page_regions
            where lower(REGION_FOOTER_TEXT) like '%<img%'
)
select std.pass_yn,                          
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) has an image with no alt text (`%3`)', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => substr(std.src,1,50)) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` has an image with no alt text (app %1, page %2, region id %3)', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
				p3 => aapr.region_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       std.src,
			 std.workspace
from std
inner join apex_application_page_regions aapr on std.region_id = aapr.region_id
                                              and std.application_id = aapr.application_id
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where std.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'

test.test_name: IR Column Link Authorization Matches Destination
test.query_clob:
select case when coalesce(spu.element_authorization, 'N/A') =  coalesce (aap.authorization_scheme, 'N/A')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       spu.application_id, 
       spu.page_id, 
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       spu.last_updated_by,
       spu.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('The authorization scheme (%3) on column `%0` (report `%6`, page %1, app %2) does not match the destination (page %4, authorization `%5`)',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p3 => coalesce(spu.element_authorization,'null'),
                          p4 => spu.destination_page_id,
                          p5 => coalesce(aap.authorization_scheme,'null'),
                          p6 => spu.parent_element_name
                          ) validation_failure_message,
        apex_string.format('The authorization scheme on column `%0` (report `%6`, page %1, app %2) does not match the destination',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p6 => spu.parent_element_name
                          ) issue_title,
       spu.page_authorization, 
       spu.url_type, 
       spu.element_label, 
       spu.element_name, 
       spu.parent_element_name, 
       spu.destination_app_id, 
       spu.destination_page_id, 
       aap.authorization_scheme dest_author_schema, 
       spu.element_authorization,
			 spu.element_id component_id,
			 spu.parent_element_id parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
 from mv_svt_ir_cols spu
 inner join apex_application_pages aap on spu.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                       and spu.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
 left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                      and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id

 where spu.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
 and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation: The authorization scheme of a column link should match that of its destination

test.test_name: Button display positions should not be legacy or deprecated
test.query_clob:
select case when svt_apex_view.display_position_is_violation (
                p_display_position_code => aapb.display_position_code,
                p_template_id           => apr.template_id,
                p_application_id        => aapb.application_id) = 'Y'
						then 'N'
						else 'Y'
						end pass_yn, 
       aapb.application_id, 
       aapb.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapb.last_updated_by,
       aapb.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (page %1, app %2) is in an invalid (legacy or deprecated) display position (`%3`)',
              p0 => aapb.button_name,
              p1 => aapb.page_id,
              p2 => aapb.application_id,
              p3 => aapb.display_position_code
            ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` in legacy / deprecated position (page %1, app %2)',
              p0 => aapb.button_name,
              p1 => aapb.page_id,
              p2 => aapb.application_id
            ) issue_title,
       aapb.button_id component_id, 
       null parent_component_id,
       aapb.display_position,
       aapb.display_position_code,
       apr.template_id,
       aapb.button_name,
			 aapb.workspace
from apex_application_page_buttons aapb
inner join apex_application_page_regions apr on aapb.region_id = apr.region_id
                                             and aapb.application_id = apr.application_id
                                             and aapb.page_id = apr.page_id
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapb.page_id and aap.application_id = aapb.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapb.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapb.application_id
where aapb.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation: Buttons should not be placed in display positions are deprecated or legacy
test.fix: Correct the button display position

test.test_name: Navigation List Entry Authorization Matches Destination
test.query_clob:
select case when coalesce(spu.element_authorization, 'N/A') =  coalesce (aap.authorization_scheme, 'N/A')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       spu.application_id, 
       null page_id, 
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       spu.last_updated_by,
       spu.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('The authorization scheme (%3) on the Navigation List Entry `%0` (app %2) does not match the destination (page %4, authorization `%5`)',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p3 => coalesce(spu.element_authorization,'null'),
                          p4 => spu.destination_page_id,
                          p5 => coalesce(aap.authorization_scheme,'null'),
                          p6 => spu.parent_element_name
                          ) validation_failure_message,
        apex_string.format('The authorization scheme on the Navigation List Entry `%0` (app %2) does not match the destination',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p6 => spu.parent_element_name
                          ) issue_title,
       spu.url_type, 
       spu.element_label, 
       spu.element_name, 
       spu.parent_element_name, 
       spu.destination_app_id, 
       spu.destination_page_id, 
       aap.authorization_scheme dest_author_schema, 
       spu.element_authorization,
			 spu.element_id component_id, 
			 spu.parent_element_id parent_component_id,
			 spu.workspace
 from mv_svt_list_entries spu
 inner join apex_application_pages aap on spu.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                       and spu.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
 left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id

 where spu.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
 and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
 and spu.url_type = 'LIST_ENTRY'
test.explanation: The authorization scheme of a Navigation List Entry should match that of its destination
test.fix: Add the requisite authorization scheme to the Navigation List Entry

test.test_name: Button Authorization Matches Destination
test.query_clob:
select case when coalesce(spu.element_authorization, 'N/A') =  coalesce (aap.authorization_scheme, 'N/A')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       spu.application_id, 
       spu.page_id, 
			 null created_on,
			 null created_by,
       spu.last_updated_by,
       spu.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('The authorization scheme (%3) on button `%0` (page %1, app %2) does not match the destination (page %4, authorization `%5`)',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
                          p3 => coalesce(spu.element_authorization,'null'),
                          p4 => spu.destination_page_id,
                          p5 => coalesce(aap.authorization_scheme,'null')
                          ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('The authorization scheme on button `%0` does not match the destination (page %1, app %2, button id %3)',
                          p0 => spu.element_label,
                          p1 => spu.page_id,
                          p2 => spu.application_id,
													p3 => spu.element_id
                          ) issue_title,
       spu.page_authorization, 
       spu.url_type, 
       spu.element_label, 
       spu.element_name, 
       spu.parent_element_name, 
       spu.destination_app_id, 
       spu.destination_page_id, 
       aap.authorization_scheme dest_author_schema, 
       spu.element_authorization,
			 spu.element_id component_id,
			 spu.parent_element_id parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
 from mv_svt_buttons spu
 inner join apex_application_pages aap on spu.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                       and spu.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
 where spu.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
 and url_type = 'BUTTON_URL'
 and spu.destination_app_id = spu.application_id
 and spu.destination_page_id != spu.page_id
test.explanation: The authorization scheme of a button should match that of its destination
test.fix: Add the requisite authorization scheme to the button

test.test_name: Public pages should not require authentication
test.query_clob:
select a60.pass_yn, 
       a60.application_id,
       a60.page_id, 
       a60.page_name, 
       a60.page_access_protection, 
       a60.page_mode,
       a60.page_requires_authentication,
       a60.build_option,
       a60.build_option_status,
       a60.authorization_scheme,
       a60.last_updated_by, 
       a60.last_updated_on, 
       a60.created_by, 
       a60.created_on,
       case when a60.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^Public pages should not have authorization scheme. This page has authorization scheme: %5^',
            p0 => a60.page_access_protection, 
            p1 => a60.page_mode,
            p2 => a60.page_requires_authentication,
            p3 => a60.build_option,
            p4 => a60.build_option_status,
            p5 => a60.authorization_scheme,
            p6 => a60.last_updated_by, 
            p7 => a60.last_updated_on, 
            p8 => a60.created_by, 
            p9 => a60.created_on
            )
            end as validation_failure_message,
       case when a60.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^Remove authorization scheme from public page %0 (app %1)^',
            p0 => a60.page_id, 
            p1 => a60.application_id
            )
            end as issue_title,
			 a60.page_id component_id,
			 null parent_component_id,
			 a60.workspace
from (
     select 
     case when aap.page_requires_authentication = 'No'
          then case when aap.authorization_scheme is null
                    then 'Y'
                    else case when aap.authorization_scheme = 'APPLICATION SENTRY'
                              then 'Y'
                              else 'N'
                              end
                    end
          else 'Y'
          end as pass_yn, 
     aap.application_id,
     aap.page_id, 
     aap.page_name, 
     aap.page_access_protection, 
     aap.page_mode,
     aap.page_requires_authentication,
     aap.build_option,
     bo.build_option_status,
	   bo.status_on_export,
     aap.authorization_scheme,
     aap.created_by created_by, 
     aap.created_on created_on,
     aap.last_updated_by, 
     aap.last_updated_on,
	   aap.workspace
     from apex_application_pages aap
     inner join v_svt_apex_applications aa on aap.application_id = aa.application_id
                                     and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
     left join apex_application_build_options bo on aap.application_id = bo.application_id
                                                 and aap.build_option = bo.build_option_name
     where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
	   and (bo.status_on_export != 'Exclude' or bo.build_option_status is null)
) a60
test.explanation: Public pages should be public but they can be victims of an over-zealous attempt to give all pages an authorization scheme
test.fix: Remove the authorization scheme

test.test_name: Columns should have a valid authorization scheme
test.query_clob:
select 
a70.pass_yn,
a70.application_id,
a70.page_id,
a70.page_name,
a70.region_name,
a70.column_alias,
a70.heading,
a70.authorization_scheme,
a70.authorization_scheme_id,
a70.created_by, 
a70.created_on, 
a70.last_updated_by, 
a70.last_updated_on,
case when a70.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^Columm, %1, in region, %0, has an invalid authorization scheme: %3^',
            p0 => a70.region_name,
            p1 => a70.column_alias,
            p2 => a70.heading,
            p3 => a70.authorization_scheme,
            p4 => a70.authorization_scheme_id
            )
            end as validation_failure_message,
case when a70.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^Columm %1 has an invalid authorization scheme (app %2, page %3)^',
            p0 => a70.region_name,
            p1 => a70.column_alias,
            p2 => a70.application_id,
            p3 => a70.page_id
            )
            end as issue_title,
a70.component_id,
a70.parent_component_id,
a70.workspace
from (
     select
     case when prc.authorization_scheme = prc.authorization_scheme_id
          then 'N'
          else 'Y'
          end as pass_yn,
     prc.application_id,
     prc.page_id,
     prc.page_name,
     prc.region_name,
     prc.column_alias,
     prc.heading,
     prc.authorization_scheme,
     prc.authorization_scheme_id,
     app.created_by, 
     app.created_on, 
     coalesce(prc.last_updated_by, app.last_updated_by) last_updated_by, 
     coalesce(prc.last_updated_on, app.last_updated_on) last_updated_on,
	   prc.region_report_column_id component_id,
	   null parent_component_id,
	   prc.workspace
     from apex_application_page_rpt_cols prc
     inner join apex_application_pages app on  app.page_id = prc.page_id
                                           and app.application_id = prc.application_id
     inner join  v_svt_apex_applications aa on prc.application_id = aa.application_id
                                        and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
	   left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = app.build_option
                                                          and aabo1.application_id = app.application_id
     left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = prc.build_option
                                                          and aabo2.application_id = prc.application_id

     where prc.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
     and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
     and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
     and prc.authorization_scheme is not null
 	   and prc.authorization_scheme not in ('MUST_NOT_BE_PUBLIC_USER')
) a70
test.explanation: The authorization on your column is in an invalid state
test.fix: Remove the authorization scheme or replace it.

test.test_name: Column Link should be valid
test.query_clob:
select 
a100.pass_yn,
a100.application_id,
a100.column_link_url,
a100.region_name,
a100.heading,
a100.page_id,
a100.page_name,
a100.column_alias,
a100.created_by,
a100.created_on,
a100.last_updated_by, 
a100.last_updated_on,
case when a100.pass_yn = 'N'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^invalid colum link: %0 
        region name : %1
        heading : %2 
        column_alias : %3^',
     p0 => a100.column_link_url,
     p1 => a100.region_name,
     p2 => a100.heading,
     p3 => a100.column_alias
     )
     end as validation_failure_message,
case when a100.pass_yn = 'N'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^Invalid colum link (page %1, app %2)^',
     p0 => a100.column_link_url,
     p1 => a100.page_id,
     p2 => a100.application_id
     )
     end as issue_title,
a100.component_id,
a100.parent_component_id,
a100.workspace
from (
    select 
    svt_stds_parser.is_valid_url (p_origin_app_id => prc.application_id,
                                p_url           => prc.column_link_url
                                ) pass_yn,
    prc.application_id,
    prc.column_link_url,
    prc.region_name,
    prc.heading,
    prc.page_id,
    prc.page_name,
    prc.column_alias,
    app.created_by, 
    app.created_on, 
    coalesce(prc.last_updated_by, app.last_updated_by) last_updated_by, 
    coalesce(prc.last_updated_on, app.last_updated_on) last_updated_on,
	  prc.region_report_column_id component_id,
	  null parent_component_id,
	  prc.workspace
    from  apex_application_page_rpt_cols prc 
    inner join apex_application_pages app on  app.page_id = prc.page_id
                                          and app.application_id = prc.application_id
    inner join v_svt_apex_applications aa on  aa.application_id = prc.application_id
                                      and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
	  left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = app.build_option
                                                         and aabo1.application_id = app.application_id
    left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = prc.build_option
                                                         and aabo2.application_id = prc.application_id

    where prc.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
    and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
    and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
) a100
test.explanation: The URL in the column link is invalid
test.fix: Fix the link or remove it.

test.test_name: List URLs should be valid
test.query_clob:
with 
    plug_link_count as (
        select pl.list_id, count(*) lcount
            from apex_application_page_regions pl
            group by pl.list_id
        ),
    nav_link_count as (
        select ui.navigation_list_id, count(*) lcount
            from apex_appl_user_interfaces ui
            group by ui.navigation_list_id
        ),
    nav_bar_link_count as (
        select ui.nav_bar_list_id, count(*) lcount
            from apex_appl_user_interfaces ui
            group by ui.nav_bar_list_id
        ),
    a120 as (
        select
        svt_stds_parser.is_valid_url (p_origin_app_id => ale.application_id,
                                    p_url           => ale.entry_target
                                    ) pass_yn,
        ale.application_id,
        ale.entry_target,
        ale.list_name,
        ale.list_id, 
        ale.list_entry_id component_id,
			  ale.list_entry_parent_id parent_component_id,
        ale.entry_text,
        coalesce(plc.lcount,0) + coalesce(nlc.lcount,0) + coalesce(nblc.lcount,0) ref_count,
        ale.condition_type_code,
        ale.build_option,
        bo.build_option_status,
			  bo.status_on_export,
        aa1.created_on,
        aa1.created_by,
        ale.last_updated_by, 
        ale.last_updated_on,
			  ale.workspace
        from apex_application_list_entries ale
        inner join v_svt_apex_applications aa1 on ale.application_id = aa1.application_id
                                        and aa1.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
        left join apex_application_build_options bo on ale.application_id = bo.application_id
                                                    and ale.build_option = bo.build_option_name
        left join plug_link_count plc on plc.list_id = ale.list_id
        left join nav_link_count nlc on nlc.navigation_list_id = ale.list_id
        left join nav_bar_link_count nblc on nblc.nav_bar_list_id = ale.list_id
        where ale.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
			  and (ale.condition_type_code != 'NEVER' or ale.condition_type_code is null)
        and (bo.status_on_export != 'Exclude' or bo.status_on_export is null)
    )
select 
a120.pass_yn,
a120.application_id,
null page_id,
a120.entry_target,
a120.list_name,
a120.list_id, 
a120.component_id,
a120.entry_text,
a120.ref_count,
a120.condition_type_code,
a120.build_option,
a120.build_option_status,
a120.created_by,
a120.created_on,
a120.last_updated_by, 
a120.last_updated_on,
case when a120.pass_yn = 'N'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^List entry (%4,%3) in list (%1, %2) has an invalid link: %0 (build: %7)^',
     p0 => a120.entry_target,
     p1 => a120.list_name,
     p2 => a120.list_id, 
     p3 => a120.component_id,
     p4 => a120.entry_text,
     p5 => a120.ref_count,
     p6 => a120.condition_type_code,
     p7 => a120.build_option,
     p8 => a120.build_option_status
     )
     end as validation_failure_message,
case when a120.pass_yn = 'N'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^Invalid link in list entry (%4) in list %1, app %0^',
     p0 => a120.application_id,
     p1 => a120.list_name,
     p2 => a120.list_id, 
     p3 => a120.component_id,
     p4 => a120.entry_text
     )
     end as issue_title,
a120.parent_component_id,
a120.workspace
from a120
test.explanation: The URL in the list link is invalid
test.fix: Fix the URL or eliminate the list item

test.test_name: Button URLs should be valid
test.query_clob:
select 
a110.pass_yn,
a110.application_id,
a110.page_id,
a110.page_name,
a110.redirect_url,
a110.button_name,  
a110.label, 
a110.region,
a110.created_by,
a110.created_on,
a110.last_updated_by, 
a110.last_updated_on,
case when a110.pass_yn = 'N'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^Button, `%1`/`%2`, has an invalid link: `%0` (region : `%3`)^',
     p0 => a110.redirect_url,
     p1 => a110.button_name,  
     p2 => a110.label, 
     p3 => a110.region
     )
     end as validation_failure_message,
case when a110.pass_yn = 'N'
     then apex_string.format(p_message => 
     q'^Button has an invalid link (page %0, app %1)^',
     p0 => a110.page_id,
     p1 => a110.application_id
     )
     end as issue_title,
a110.component_id,
a110.parent_component_id,
a110.workspace
from (
    select 
    svt_stds_parser.is_valid_url (p_origin_app_id => bl.application_id,

                                ) pass_yn,
    bl.application_id, 
    bl.redirect_url,
    bl.page_id,
    bl.page_name,
    bl.button_name,  
    bl.label, 
    bl.region,
    app.created_by,
    app.created_on,
    coalesce(bl.last_updated_by, app.last_updated_by) last_updated_by, 
    coalesce(bl.last_updated_on, app.last_updated_on) last_updated_on,
	  bl.button_id component_id,
	  null parent_component_id,
	  bl.workspace
    from apex_application_page_buttons bl
    inner join apex_application_pages app on  app.page_id = bl.page_id
                                          and app.application_id = bl.application_id
    inner join v_svt_apex_applications aa1 on bl.application_id = aa1.application_id
                                       and aa1.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
	  left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = app.build_option
                                                         and aabo1.application_id = app.application_id
    left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = bl.build_option
                                                         and aabo2.application_id = bl.application_id
	  where bl.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
    and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
    and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
) a110
test.explanation: The button URL is invalid
test.fix: Fix the URL or eliminate the button

test.test_name: Pages should be reachable
test.query_clob:
select 'N' pass_yn,
       aap.application_id,
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (`%2`, app %1) is unreachable. please link to it / delete it / put under a `dev_only` build.',
                          p0 => aap.page_id,
                          p1 => aap.application_id,
                          p2 => aap.page_name) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) is unreachable',
                          p0 => aap.page_id,
                          p1 => aap.application_id) issue_title,
       aap.build_option,
       abo.build_option_status,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aap.workspace,
       aap.page_name
from apex_application_pages aap
left outer join v_mv_svt spu on spu.destination_app_id = aap.application_id
                                            and spu.destination_page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                   and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and spu.destination_page_id is null
and aap.page_id not in (0,1,101,9999)
and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation: Pages that are not linked to should be removed to declutter the application : This page is not linked to from anywhere. If this page is not in use, it should be removed to declutter the application
test.fix: Delete the page or link to it.

test.test_name: Breadcrumb Authorization Matches Destination
test.query_clob:
select case when coalesce(spu.element_authorization, 'N/A') =  coalesce (aap.authorization_scheme, 'N/A')
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       spu.application_id, 
       null page_id, 
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       spu.last_updated_by,
       spu.last_updated_on,

test.test_name: Regular Pages should be Current in Navigation
test.query_clob:
select 'N'  pass_yn,
       aap.application_id,
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) should be listed as current for an entry in the navigation menu (%2)',
                          p0 => aap.page_id,
                          p1 => aap.application_id,
                          p2 => aa.navigation_list
                        ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) is not listed as current for any entry in the navigation menu',
                          p0 => aap.page_id,
                          p1 => aap.application_id
                        ) issue_title,
       aap.build_option,
       abo.build_option_status,
       abo.status_on_export,
       aa.navigation_list,
       aap.page_template,
			 aap.page_id component_id,
			 null parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
from apex_application_pages aap
inner join apex_applications aa on aap.application_id = aa.application_id
                                and aa.navigation_list is not null
left outer join (select ale.application_id, cfpg.column_value page_id
                    from apex_application_list_entries ale
                    join table(apex_string.split(ale.current_for_pages_expression, ',')) cfpg on ale.current_for_pages_type_code = 'COLON_DELIMITED_PAGE_LIST'
                    join apex_applications aa on  ale.application_id = aa.application_id
                                              and ale.list_name = aa.navigation_list
                    where cfpg.column_value is not null
                    and validate_conversion(cfpg.column_value as number) = 1
                ) cdpl on  cdpl.application_id =  aap.application_id
                       and cdpl.page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join (select ale.application_id, svt_stds_parser.page_from_url (p_origin_app_id => ale.application_id, p_url => ale.entry_target) page_id
                    from apex_application_list_entries ale
                    join apex_applications aa on  ale.application_id = aa.application_id
                                              and ale.list_name = aa.navigation_list
                    where ale.current_for_pages_type_code = 'TARGET_PAGE'
                ) tp on  tp.application_id = aap.application_id
                     and tp.page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join (select application_id, page_id, count(*) proc_count
                    from apex_application_page_proc
                    where process_type = 'Form - Initialization'
                    group by application_id, page_id
                ) pp on  pp.application_id = aap.application_id
                     and pp.page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                   and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE') 
and aap.page_mode = 'Normal'
and aap.page_id not in (0,101,9999)
and cdpl.application_id is null 
and tp.application_id is null
and pp.proc_count is null
and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aap.page_template not like 'AO%'
test.explanation: All non-form, normal Pages should be Current in the Navigation Menu : Normal non-form pages should be listed as current for a navigation menu list entry
test.fix: Make the page `current` for a navigation menu list entry

test.test_name: Pages should not have unresolved critical issues
test.query_clob:
with msglvl1 as (select application_id, 
                        page_id, 
                        page_view_id, 
                        message,
                        max(message_timestamp) error_timestamp
                from apex_debug_messages
                where message_level in (1)
                group by application_id, 
                         page_id, 
                         page_view_id, 
                         message),
   actlgl as (select application_id, 
                     page_id, 
                     max(view_date) most_recent_view_date
                from apex_workspace_activity_log
                group by application_id, page_id)
select case when act.most_recent_view_date > cast(msglvl1.error_timestamp as date)
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       msglvl1.error_timestamp,
       act.most_recent_view_date,
       aap.workspace,
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) has a critical (message level 1) error: `%3`, page_view_id : `%4` (from apex_debug_messages)', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id,
        p3 => substr(msglvl1.message,1,100),
        p4 => msglvl1.page_view_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) has a critical error', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) issue_title,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aap.page_name,
       aap.page_mode,
       msglvl1.message,
       msglvl1.page_view_id      
from msglvl1 
inner join apex_application_pages aap on msglvl1.application_id = aap.application_id
                                      and msglvl1.page_id = aap.page_id
                                      and aap.page_id not in (101)
left outer join actlgl act on act.application_id = msglvl1.application_id
                           and act.page_id = msglvl1.page_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aap.application_id
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation: Looking for pages associated with message\_level 1 issues logged in apex\_debug\_messages
test.fix: Once the page critical error is resolved, run the page in debug mode to resolve the error
